reviewText: I saw this Gaither cd advertised on tv and it said it was "hymn favorites".  Very disappointing.  I have Gaither Cds already, but this was a real let down.  They weren't all hymns, although there was a couple. Don't waste your money on this Gaither one.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: This Gaither DVD contains a world of old hymns, some sung in a new format, that warm the heart. Being a fan of Gaither Homecoming on TV, I feel like I know the singers and my heart soars with them as they present these old hymns.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: This is a great movie!  Inspiring and of historical value.  Encourages Christians to use their faith to bring about social change.  Shows that one person with great passion can bring about change despite great odds.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: AMAZING GRACE: JEFF BUCKLEY is a documentary by Nyla Bialek Adams and Laurie Trombley on the 1990s cult musician who released one album, the superb GRACE, toured it around the world, and then tragically drowned while recording a follow-up. Promo DVDs of AMAZING GRACE have long been auctioned off or passed around fans, but as I write this Columbia Records is set to release the documentary in June 2009 as part of theGrace Around the World. Some of the footage of Jeff is taken from Sony's sepia-hued electronic press kit (available on theGRACE Legacy Edition) or theLive in ChicagoDVD. But most it is is never-before-seen footage of Jeff, from early video of him outside Sin-e to Australian radio interviews late in his career. All four of the musicians who collaborated with Jeff Buckley on GRACE are interviewed, as are friends, his mother Mary Guibert, critics, DJ's, record industry moguls, and musicians influenced by him.This is fairly entertaining viewing for fans. However, the biggest weakness of this documentary is that it is an authorized biography insistent on total adulation. Among their comments on Jeff's struggles with his second album, no one raises the very real possibility that he had hit a creative dead end and was destined to be a one-hit wonder. Jeff's life was haunted by the figure of his absent father Tim Buckley, but Tim Buckley and whatever inspiration he might have had on Jeff get nary a mention here. A documentary produced by the BBC a few years prior gave a much more balanced picture of Buckley's life, as have some of the print biographies.
summary: Entertaining, but suffers from the lack of any critical angle
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: Includes my all time favorite song....I Then Shall Live....it 'plays' over and over in my spirit....where I can sing in perfect harmony too!
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: he and his homecoming friends are awesome. I have gone to their concerts and what a awesome experience.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: Very good product. I bought it as a Christmas gift for my sister and she just loves it very much. She in interested in more products by the same author.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: Outstanding video of the Gaither Homecoming Friends concert.  I would have given it five stars but the rating mechanism would only allow me to register four stars.  Am looking forward to additional releases from this concert.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley

reviewText: It's good, but not one of my favorites.  There are so many truly spectacular videos by the Homecoming crew that the new ones are held to a very high standard.
Title: Amazing Grace: Jeff Buckley
